name: Starship: A.R.C
description:
Greetings Pilot, welcome aboard Starship A.R.C. Congratulations, only a select few are granted access to embark on this Journey. You'll be launching shortly so here's a brief rundown of your mission.

- Avoid all incoming space debris

- Collect all colored orbs for points

- Use points to unlock remaining Spaceships

Good luck on your flight.
